atk_abil: Normal Attack: Fires an exploding bullet which explodes upon impact, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
Skill Attack: Summons a swarm of crows that attacks multiple targets and restores some of its own HP.
Special Ability 1: Increases basic game speed by 4%, increases the movement speed of undead units by 3% and attack range of undead units by 4%.
Special Ability 2: Makes itself invisible (cloaking), and advances stealthily to destroy the enemy base.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000.
Special Ability 4: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts buff to increase its own movement speed and attack speed.
Darkness Resistance: Increases darkness resistance by 50. ( It is applied even when Crow Knight is in Time Shop. Darkness resistance by Crow Knight does not exceed 2,000. )
Indifference: Only attacks female units and ignores male units and neutral units because they are out of its attention ( But when being attacked, it strikes back regardless of gender. )

Undead Token: Increases the undead tribe friendliness that is gained from undead unit seals by 5% for each 5-star Crow Knight, and 10% for each 6-star Crow Knight. It is applied even when Crow Knight is in Time Shop and does not exceed 100%.
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Fires an exploding bullet which explodes upon impact, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
Skill Attack: Summons a swarm of crows that attacks multiple targets and restores some of its own HP.
Special Ability 1: Increases basic game speed by 8%, increases the movement speed of undead units by 6% and attack range of undead units by 7%.
Special Ability 2: Makes itself invisible (cloaking), and advances stealthily to destroy the enemy base.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000.
Special Ability 4: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts buff to increase its own movement speed and attack speed.
Darkness Resistance: Increases darkness resistance by 100. ( It is applied even when Crow Knight is in Time Shop. Darkness resistance by Crow Knight does not exceed 2,000. )
Indifference: Only attacks female units and ignores male units and neutral units because they are out of its attention ( But when being attacked, it strikes back regardless of gender. )

Undead Token: Increases the undead tribe friendliness that is gained from undead unit seals by 5% for each 5-star Crow Knight, and 10% for each 6-star Crow Knight. It is applied even when Crow Knight is in Time Shop and does not exceed 100%.

buffs.description: Increases the Undead tribe friendliness that is gained from Undead unit seals even if Crow Knight is in the Time Shop (5-star 5%, 6-star 10%, Max 100%).
buffs.name: Undead Token

buffs.description: Increases darkness resistance even if Crow Knight is in the Time Shop (5-star 50, 6-star 100, Max 2000).
buffs.name: Darkness Resistance
